mapper.select: select qa.user_id,q.question_contents,q.question_date ,a.answer_contents, a.answer_date,count(qa.user_id) as count from newbee_mall_db.questions as q join newbee_mall_db.answer as a on q.question_id = a.question_id join qa_like as qa on a.answer_id = qa.answer_id where a.goods_id = #{goodsId} group by qa.answer_id order by ${orderByCol} desc limit #{startOffsetIndex} ,#{pageLimitNumber}
select count(*) as totalCount from answer where goods_id = #{goodsId}
